sentences.sentence: We split a fat into glycerol and fatty acids.
sentences.translation: 我们把脂肪分解为甘油和脂肪酸。

sentences.sentence: An ester of glycerol and one or more fatty acids.
sentences.translation: 酰基甘油：一种甘油酯或者一种或几种脂肪酸。

sentences.sentence: Acylglycerol (glyceride) an ester of glycerol and one or more fatty acids.
sentences.translation: 酰基甘油：一种甘油酯或者一种或几种脂肪酸。
